channel.title: CVE Feed for radareorg -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for radareorg -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-1649|2024-08-03T00:10:03.791Z -- radareorg -- radareorg%2Fradare2
item.description: Null pointer dereference in libr/bin/format/mach0/mach0.c in radareorg/radare2 in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.7.0. It is likely to be exploitable. For more general description of heap buffer overflow, see [CWE](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/476.html).

item.title: CVE-2022-1899|2024-08-03T00:17:00.930Z -- radareorg -- radareorg%2Fradare2
item.description: Out-of-bounds Read in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2022-1714|2024-08-03T00:10:03.915Z -- radareorg -- radareorg%2Fradare2
item.description: Out-of-bounds Read in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.7.0. The bug causes the program reads data past the end of the intented buffer. Typically, this can allow attackers to read sensitive information from other memory locations or cause a crash.

item.title: CVE-2022-4843|2024-08-03T01:55:45.367Z -- radareorg -- radareorg%2Fradare2
item.description: NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.8.2.

item.title: CVE-2022-1809|2024-08-03T00:17:00.598Z -- radareorg -- radareorg%2Fradare2
item.description: Access of Uninitialized Pointer in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2022-4398|2024-08-03T01:41:44.418Z -- radareorg -- radareorg%2Fradare2
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.8.0.
